channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CS Financial Aid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CS Financial Aid

item.title: CVE-2018-3076|2024-08-05T04:36:39.765Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20cs%20financial%20aid
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise CS Financial Aid component of Oracle PeopleSoft Products (subcomponent: ISIR Processing). Supported versions that are affected are 9.0 and 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise CS Financial Aid. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of PeopleSoft Enterprise CS Financial Aid accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 2.7 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
